collectors.title: Database
collectors.titleDetails: (4 total Queries, 4 of them unique across 1 Connection)

queries.sql:
select wpID,wp.added_by,wp.client, wp.auditor, wp.supervisor,wp.audmanager, wp.firm,wp.jobdur,wp.financial_year,wp.end_financial_year,wp.status,wp.remarks,wp.added_on,
        (select CONCAT(name,' - ',type) from tbl_users as tu where tu.userID = wp.added_by) as added,
        (select CONCAT(name,' - ',type) from tbl_users as tu where tu.userID = wp.auditor) as aud,
        (select CONCAT(name,' - ',type) from tbl_users as tu where tu.userID = wp.supervisor) as sup,
        (select CONCAT(name,' - ',type) from tbl_users as tu where tu.userID = wp.audmanager) as audm,
        tc.name as cli,
        tc.org
        from tbl_workpaper as wp, tbl_clients as tc
        where wp.firm = 1
        and tc.cID = wp.client
        and wp.status = 'Approved'

timelineData.name: Query
timelineData.query:
select wpID,wp.added_by,wp.client, wp.auditor, wp.supervisor,wp.audmanager, wp.firm,wp.jobdur,wp.financial_year,wp.end_financial_year,wp.status,wp.remarks,wp.added_on,
        (select CONCAT(name,' - ',type) from tbl_users as tu where tu.userID = wp.added_by) as added,
        (select CONCAT(name,' - ',type) from tbl_users as tu where tu.userID = wp.auditor) as aud,
        (select CONCAT(name,' - ',type) from tbl_users as tu where tu.userID = wp.supervisor) as sup,
        (select CONCAT(name,' - ',type) from tbl_users as tu where tu.userID = wp.audmanager) as audm,
        tc.name as cli,
        tc.org
        from tbl_workpaper as wp, tbl_clients as tc
        where wp.firm = 1
        and tc.cID = wp.client
        and wp.status = 'Approved'
